org.hibernate.type

Class ShortType

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hibernate.type.AbstractStandardBasicType<T>
      • org.hibernate.type.AbstractSingleColumnStandardBasicType<Short>
        • org.hibernate.type.ShortType
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, BasicType, DiscriminatorType<Short>, IdentifierType<Short>, LiteralType<Short>, PrimitiveType<Short>, SingleColumnType<Short>, StringRepresentableType<Short>, Type, VersionType<Short>, XmlRepresentableType<Short>

    public class ShortType
extends AbstractSingleColumnStandardBasicType<Short>
implements PrimitiveType<Short>, DiscriminatorType<Short>, VersionType<Short>
    A type that maps between SMALLINT and Short
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
